RepÂ²SI (**Reputation** and the **Reproduction** of **Social Inequality**) is a project based in the [Department of Methodology](https://www.lse.ac.uk/Methodology) at the [London School of Economics](https://www.lse.ac.uk/), funded by a Research Leadership Award from the [Leverhulme Trust](https://www.leverhulme.ac.uk/). 

This is a collaborative project, with an interdisciplinary [team](team.qmd) led by Dr. [Eleanor Power](https://eapower.github.io/). See the "[About](about.qmd)" page for more details on the project.
